game.name: Train Simulator: SBB RABe 523 EMU Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Climb the steep gradients and enjoy the incredible views taking this train along the Gotthardbahn, making sure to get your passengers to their destination safely. Get on board and master the SBB RABe 523!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Climb the steep gradients and enjoy the incredible views taking this train along the Gotthardbahn, making sure to get your passengers to their destination safely. Get on board and master the SBB RABe 523!
